title: Place uploaded photos on Hero and Quiz sections; remove Letter/Moments content while keeping closing paragraph

requirements.text: Add the two user-uploaded photos to the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use the *second uploaded photo* as the main Hero photo on the first section/page.

quotes: the second photo is the main one in the 1st page.

acceptanceCriteria: The second uploaded image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM (1).jpeg) is available in frontend/public/assets/generated as sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg (or equivalent dimensioned filename)
HeroSection renders the new hero photo from /assets/generated/sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg
HeroSection retains its existing fallback UI if the hero photo cannot be loaded

requirements.text: Display the *first uploaded photo* as a smaller, off-to-the-side image within the Quiz section/page without breaking mobile responsiveness.

quotes: the 1st phto can be off to the side in the second page(quiz page).

acceptanceCriteria: The first uploaded image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.jpeg) is available in frontend/public/assets/generated as sona-quiz-side-photo.dim_1200x1600.jpg (or equivalent dimensioned filename)
QuizSection layout shows the quiz content with a side image on desktop (e.g., in a two-column layout) and stacks gracefully on mobile (no overflow/cutoff)
The side image uses an English alt attribute (e.g., "Sona") and is visually secondary to the quiz content

requirements.text: Remove the site content/sections starting from the “A Message From the Heart” section through the Moments section, while keeping the user’s dedication paragraph in the Closing section intact.

quotes: please remove the part from a message from the heart all the way to my paragraph( dont remove my paragraph)

acceptanceCriteria: The Letter section (id="letter") is no longer rendered in the main page flow
The Moments section (id="moments") is no longer rendered in the main page flow
The Closing section still renders dedicationContent.closing.message and dedicationContent.closing.signature exactly as before
Top navigation no longer shows links to removed sections (e.g., remove/disable "Message" and "Moments" buttons), and remaining links still smooth-scroll correctly

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not serve images via the backend; photos must be rendered as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for these UI/content updates.
nonGoals: Do not change quiz question text, options, correct answers, scoring, or celebration animation behavior.
Do not modify the existing Closing section dedication paragraph content (the user’s paragraph).
Do not introduce new sections beyond placing the side photo within the existing Quiz section.

required: Portrait photo of a woman holding a white cat (sona-quiz-side-photo.dim_1200x1600.jpg)
Portrait photo of a woman wearing a hat and sunglasses with colorful lights (sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg)
